name: EAN, UPC and ISBN for WooCommerce
author: howdytheme

sections.description:
UPC, EAN, and ITF are globally recognized unique identifiers for products.

Product EAN, UPC, and ITF for WooCommerce lets you set the EAN, UPC, and ITF for each product of your shop.

With our advanced barcode management plugin, not only are all barcodes guaranteed to be unique, but you can conveniently view and customize them right on the product editing page.

Our feature-rich plugin goes beyond automatic barcode creation and display. It offers effortless customization, support for all product types, and an array of additional features to streamline your e-commerce experience.

Features:

  • Easy Setup
  • Enable plugin
  • Select type
  • Enable ean number shop and single product page
  • Enable ean number cart and thank you page (i.e., “order received”) page
  • Select ean text position on single product and shop page
  • Customize label on single product and shop page
  • Enable ean on admin products list column and admin edit product page
  • Set ean position on admin edit product page
  • Customize ean label on admin edit product page
  • Enable for required field
  • Enable option for checking ena if it is valid or not
  • Enable option for displaying invalid “EAN” in red mark and valid “EAN” in green mark in admin products column list
  • Enable ean to display on thank you page and email order item table
  • Enable option search products using EAN values in the product admin area
  • Select Text Color, Background Color and Font Size
  • Enable barcode image on admin edit product page
  • Enable barcode image on shop and single product page
  • Enable barcode image on cart and thank you page (i.e., “order received”) page
  • Enable barcode image position on single product and shop page
  • Customize barcode style generator setting
  • Set barcode border and background color
  • Set barcode border width and height
  • Set barcode label font size and font option
  • Set barcode label align and text position
  • Add barcode label font family
  • WPML Support
sections.installation:
1. Make sure you have woocommerce installed.
  2. Download the file to install and activate.
  3. Done! Just remember to keep the plugins up to date!
